name: express-api
description: Express API with Docker and TypeScript

scripts.db:migrate: docker compose --profile dev exec api-dev npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:create: docker compose --profile dev exec api-dev npx prisma migrate dev --create-only
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: docker compose --profile dev exec api-dev npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:reset: docker compose --profile dev exec api-dev npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:generate: docker compose --profile dev exec api-dev npx prisma generate
scripts.db:studio: docker compose --profile dev exec api-dev npx prisma studio --port 5555 --browser none
